elements.text: You are at a crowded movie theater alone and enjoying your movie despite experiencing some dyskinesia. You notice people staring at you while you watch the movie. This makes you feel self-conscious, and not being able to explain yourself makes you feel...

elements.name: The Movies Solo_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
